email_body: i will try to get tomorrow. if not, is another day okay? Errol McLaughlin@ENRON 01/31/2001 07:46 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Sherry John, Could you do me a big favor. Sherry has been really working hard and doing a good job. Do you think that you could talk with one of your contacts and get her a pair of Rockets tickets. I know they are a playing the Clippers tommorrow night. I know that no one else wants to see the Clippers, but she's never been to a game and would really appreciate it. Thanks, Errol, X5-8274
